explanation: [0-0] A little girl with blonde braids is sitting on a checkered blanket. She is wearing a pink T-shirt and gray shorts, holding a box of potato chips in her right hand and a chip in her left hand. Behind her is green grass and a white wall covered with green vines and pink flowers.

[0-4] The little girl is happily eating potato chips. A hand holding a slice of watermelon extends from the right side of the screen and places it in front of the girl. Immediately, the word "TIDAK" appears above the girl's head. The girl reaches out her left hand to push the watermelon away, then the English word disappears, and she continues to eat potato chips. A right hand appears on the right side of the screen and takes away the whole box of chips.

The woman lifts the potato chips and pours them all on the ground.
